results.description: Ten-man Paris St-Germain end a run of three consecutive away defeats with victory at Angers.
results.shortTitle: Neymar helps PSG end away losing streak
results.title: Angers 1-2 Paris St-Germain: Neymar helps champions end away losing streak

results.description: The French league is investigating "doubts about the integrity" of Caen's Ligue 1 home defeat by Angers after a complaint by Guingamp.
results.shortTitle: French league look into Caen-Angers game
results.title: French league investigate Caen's loss to Angers after Guingamp complain

results.description: Three more Ligue 1 games this weekend are postponed amid fears of more violent "yellow vest" protests in France over rising living costs.
results.title: France protests: Three more Ligue 1 games postponed, including Monaco v Nice

results.description: Paris St-Germain's potent trio of Edinson Cavani, Kylian Mbappe and Neymar all score as the French champions beat Angers 3-1 in Ligue 1.
results.title: Paris Saint Germain 3-1 Angers

thumbnail.altText: (left to right) Edinson Cavani, Kylian Mbappe and Neymar

results.description: Birmingham City loan back Senegal international defender Cheikh Ndoye to French club Angers.
results.shortTitle: Birmingham loan back Ndoye to Angers
results.title: Cheikh Ndoye: Birmingham City loan Senegal international back to French club Angers

thumbnail.altText: Cheikh N'Doye has made 42 appearances for Birmingham City

results.description: Bristol City break their transfer record to sign Senegal international striker Famara Diedhiou from Angers for £5.3m.
results.title: Famara Diedhiou: Bristol City sign Senegal striker in club-record £5.3m deal

results.description: A 91st-minute own goal gives Paris St-Germain a dramatic Coupe de France final victory over Angers at the Stade de France.
results.title: Angers 0-1 Paris St-Germain

results.description: It's cup final day across Europe, as Barcelona beat Alaves after victories for PSG and Borussia Dortmund.
results.shortTitle: Copa del Rey final: Barcelona 3-1 Alaves - Enrique's final game in charge
results.title: Eintracht Frankfurt v Borussia Dortmund, Angers v PSG and Barcelona v Alaves

results.description: Morocco midfielder Romain Saiss joins Wolves from French Ligue 1 club Angers for an undisclosed fee on a four-year deal.
results.shortTitle: Wolves sign Morocco's Saiss from Angers
results.title: Romain Saiss: Wolves sign Angers midfielder for undisclosed fee
